location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government dated 14 September 1812. It notes that the tables of provisions supplied for the Resident's guidance do not include any provision for firewood for the sepoy factory guard; it is the Resident's opinion that firewood should be provided.
